Articles.Content: I would like to have a 3.75m "Hitchhiker" type habitat to do Skylab with.
We would also need a complete revamp of the 3.75 meter parts, and by that I mean rescaled parts for 3.75 meter rockets.

As long as it looks different from the hitchhiker (not a scaled up and slightly different textured) and maybe more like it's made from a fuel tank, maybe even rounded edges so it looks like it is a solid inflatable habitat? No wait ignore that idea, let's just have it be a 2.5 meter station part that inflates to 3.75 meters!!!

You could do that already by yourselves, just create a new part by copying the one you want to rescale and modify values.

Also there is a mod that can rescale almost everything.
If you are happy to use mods I believe LLL SXT has a 3.75m habitat that is different to the Hitchhiker cabin.
